1691480.name: World Titans War
1691480.description:
Welcome to World Titans War!


The game where you create your own destiny in a world at war filled with action and adventure. Customize your avatar however you want, from hairstyles to facial expressions, and be unique! Develop skills to make life in this world more comfortable and challenge your limits.

Explore the entire map in search of areas you can raid and get valuable resources. Cities, towns, mines, quarries, military bases, and strategic zones, they all have something to offer! Complete missions to help your clan survive the war, earn their friendship, and get rewards.

Build your own base, either with blueprints you find on the map, modular construction, or just taking over any house you see. The limit of construction is in your imagination! Make objects to improve your camps, trade with merchants to get Titan Coins, and create a clan to sow chaos with your friends.

Control different vehicles, such as tanks, planes, trucks, and classic cars, to move around the map and crush your enemies. Choose a side and enlist in the military race, complete missions, and increase your rank until you become a General. Organize and fight alongside your allies to conquer flags, build camps, and fortify the zones under your control!

In World Titans War, you set the limit. Are you ready to survive and thrive in this war-torn world?

Join now and create your own story!
1691480.supported_languages:
英语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 德语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙
*具有完全音频支持的语言
